title: Added flow diagrams to README documentation
body: Created flow diagrams describing each route covered in app.py, including sub-routes from optional URL variables e.g. '/uni_modules/<year>'.

title: Update to 'forms.py'
body: Update to 'forms.py' to ensure that the form only successfully validates if BOTH or NEITHER of 'link_title' and 'link' are set (mutually inclusive events). Added two new test cases to test_forms.py to reflect this; 'test_AddToLog_only_link' and 'test_AddToLog_only_link_title'. Also, reordered the tests so same-form tests are together.

title: Wrote documentation for Course Progress Tracker Project
body: GitHub README file containing the software description and unit testing guide containing screenshots of the web application, code snippets and explanations.

title: Added 'Pytest' Unit Testing for FlaskForms
body: Added Pytest unit tests to test conditions: form input empty, form input valid, form input invalid, form input missing required fields.

title: Added 'Learning Log' to Course Progress Track
body: This log can be used to record learning progress in a similar way to my 100 days of code log.

title: Started 'Course Progress Tracker'
body: Started working on this Flask web application.

title: Added installation guide to README documentation
body: Wrote documentation for the process of installing the project onto a local machine. Includes prerequisites, cloning the project repository, installing the required packages and running the web application.
